Name: Slapshot: Rebound
About the game: Take to the ice in this physics-based multiplayer game where you play an arcade style match of hockey. No shoot button, no puck glue, no RNG. Itâ€™s up to you and your team to take control of the puck, pass, shoot, outplay your opponents. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players! Free-to-Play Slapshot: Rebound is free-to-play indefinitely. Cosmetic elements are available for purchase and obtainable through gameplay. We do not participate in any form of pay-to-win, because that sucks. Train like the pros Become the best player in Slapshot Rebound with several training modes that test your skills to the max, beat your high score and get better through small minigames. Climb to the top Stake your claim as the best Slapshot: Rebound player as you climb the leaderboard rankings Customize yourself Style your Slapatar with countless cosmetic items, from hats and hair to gloves and glasses, personalise and accessorise your character however you want as you show off to your teammates and opponents on the ice COMING SOON: The Pond Socialise, Skate and Slap! In this open area you can chat, practice and have fun with others without any pressure alongside waiting while you queue for some Rebound games. Gone are the days of being stuck in a menu or chat screen. Are you ready to take to the ice?
